attributes.action: make all holy books free, and no companies can make a profit by selling holy books which should be available to anyone.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is to make all holy books including the holy bible in all translation, the quran, the guru gran sahib etc free to buy. I want to ensure no business makes a profit from selling something that they have had no imput and and frankly isnt theres. i feel that holy books should be available to anyone, anywhere. All schools should have holy books for at least 1  per 10 pupils and every prison inmate should be able to request a holy book that they can read in prison as alot of individuals find faith whilst in prison.
